Abstract: This dataset represents the locations of Embassy in Washington, DC 2006

    <descript>
      <abstract>This dataset represents the locations of Embassy in Washington, DC 2006</abstract>
      <purpose>This data is used for the planning and management of Washington, D.C. by local government agencies.</purpose>
    </descript>

      <procstep>
        <procdesc>Dataset copied from the CD obtained from Washington, DC 2005

Staff reviewed information available using various web sources to update embassy content and locations, looking for additions, deletions, and changes in the data. Staff performed further research to resolve issues between source and data content.   Embassies were moved manually to there correct locations using the planimetrics and the MAR as a background.  Staff checked embassy website links using web resources and search engines.</procdesc>
        <procdate>2006</procdate>
